Package org.neo4j.test.extension

Interface DbmsController

  • public interface DbmsController
    Implementations of this interface can be injected into DbmsExtension based tests, to allow them to restart the DBMS or the database the test is operating on.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void restartDatabase()  
      void restartDatabase​(String databaseName)
      Restart the database without changing anything.
      default void restartDbms()  
      default void restartDbms​(String databaseName)
      Restart the DBMS without changing anything.
      void restartDbms​(String databaseName, UnaryOperator<TestDatabaseManagementServiceBuilder> callback)
      Restart the DBMS while applying the given changes to the builder.
      default void restartDbms​(UnaryOperator<TestDatabaseManagementServiceBuilder> callback)  

    • Method Detail

      • restartDbms

        void restartDbms​(String databaseName,
                 UnaryOperator<TestDatabaseManagementServiceBuilder> callback)
        Restart the DBMS while applying the given changes to the builder.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - name of the database used to re inject dependencies from after restart
        callback - The callback that will apply changes to the DBMS builder.

      • restartDbms

        default void restartDbms​(String databaseName)
        Restart the DBMS without changing anything.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - name of the database used to re inject dependencies from after restart

      • restartDatabase

        void restartDatabase​(String databaseName)
        Restart the database without changing anything.
        Parameters:
        databaseName - name of the database to restart

      • restartDbms

        default void restartDbms()

      • restartDbms

        default void restartDbms​(UnaryOperator<TestDatabaseManagementServiceBuilder> callback)

      • restartDatabase

        default void restartDatabase()
